meanings.definition: Staggarts (noun): a group of deer, especially male deer
meanings.sent1: In the forest, we spotted a staggarts grazing peacefully.
meanings.sent2: The staggarts moved gracefully through the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The staggarts gathered under the oak tree for their daily meeting.
meanings.sent4: The majestic staggarts roamed the wilderness like kings of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the staggarts in the clearing was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Staggarts (verb): to walk unsteadily or with a staggered gait
meanings.sent1: Grandpa staggarts when he gets up from his chair.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker staggarts down the steep trail.
meanings.sent3: The toddler staggarts around the room, trying to keep balance.
meanings.sent4: The drunk man staggarts out of the bar, struggling to stay upright.
meanings.sent5: The injured bird staggarts on the ground, unable to fly.
